name: Runebound Spells
entries: At 1st level, the runes inside your body activate when you are actively channeling magic. Once per turn when you deal damage with a weapon or spell attack you deal bonus force damage equal to your proficiency bonus.
When you fail a concentration check you can spend a hit die, roll it and add it to the result, potentially allowing you to maintain concentration.
Additionally at 6th level, while you are concentrating on a sorcerer spell you gain temporary hit points equal to the spells level + your proficiency bonus at the start of each of your turns
